constraints.name: transformation
constraints.description: 通过一系列变换操作，将一个集合转换为另一个集合（反应过程）
constraints.formal: Given sets X = {X1, X2, ..., XL} and Y = {Y1, Y2, ..., YR}, a transformation T: X -> Y

constraints.name: subset_constraint
constraints.description: 初始集合是所有可能物质的子集

constraints.name: distinctness
constraints.description: 每个反应中的输入和输出物质集合内的元素都是唯一的
constraints.formal: ∀i, j (1 ≤ i < j ≤ L), Xi ≠ Xj; ∀i, j (1 ≤ i < j ≤ R), Yi ≠ Yj

constraints.name: reachability
constraints.description: 从初始集合出发，通过一系列变换操作能够到达的目标集合
constraints.formal: Starting from A, the set of all reachable substances B through transformations T
